subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Coach Alberto Zaccheroni proved his worth in Doha with a game-changing tactical switch in Japan's 1-0 defeat of Australia that could have come straight out of an Italian textbook.
snippet: Coach Alberto Zaccheroni proved his worth in Doha with a game-changing tactical switch in Japan's 1-0 defeat of Australia that could have come straight out of an Italian textbook.
